properties.label: Imóvel a Comprar, a Hipotecar ou ambos ?

properties.value:
<script type="text/javascript">

    $('#valor_cv').ready(function(){
       
        //const getValueInput = () =>{
        //  let number = document.getElementById("valor_cv").value; 
        //  document.getElementById("valor_cv").innerHTML = number; 
        //}
        
        var f1 = FormUtil.getField("valor_cv");
        var number = FormUtil.getValue("valor_cv");
        
        if(number != null && number !== ""){
            number = number.replaceAll('NaN', "0");
            number = number.replaceAll('.', "");
            number = number.replaceAll('€', "");
            number = number.replaceAll('Eur', "");
            number = number.replaceAll('EUR', "");
            number = number.replaceAll(',', '.');
            
            let num = new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-PT', { style: 'currency', currency: 'EUR' }).format(number);
        
            num = num.replace(/\s/g, '.');
            num = num.replaceAll('.€', ' EUR');
            
            $(f1).val(num);
        }else{
            //do nothing
        }  
        
        $("#submit").val("Submeter");
    });
    
    
</script>

<script>
    
    $(document).ready(function(){
        var tipoProcesso = "#form.detalhe_processo.tipo_processo[{form.processos.detalhe_processo}]#";
        tipoProcesso = "+" + tipoProcesso + "+";
        
     
        /**Falta corrigir valor do tipo de processo CVMHFiança Judicial no if**/
    
        if(!(tipoProcesso.includes("+CV+") ||  tipoProcesso.includes("+CV12+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVD12I+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVD12IE+") || 
        tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMH+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMHIE+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMH12+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMHJ+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMHF+") 
        || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMHFIE+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMHF12+") || tipoProcesso.includes("+CVMHJ+"))){
            
            $("div [id^=direito_preferencia]").parent().remove();
            $("div [id^=imovel_banco]").parent().remove();
            $("input#valor_cv").parent().remove();
        }
        

       
    });
    
    
    
    
    
    
</script>
